title: 'Loggin onto chat service problem '
body: When I came to play LoL I cant see my friends and down in client i see only Loggin onto chat service... I dunno how to fix it. Anyone know fix for this? :) Thank you :)

replies.body: The chat service on the client needs its own connection, so if you're able to connect to the client fine but not chat this is likely a small network issue. We should be able to fix this up by adjusting your port forwarding to make sure the client is able to easily connect with the chat services. Check out those steps in [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq8), but definitely, let me know if that doesn't help at all!
